about_the_game:
Oh yeah! Forget about cute postcards and selfies in front of ruins. The zone is calling you, brave man, if you have the courage to come in! This is not a recreational park, but a dirty, radioactive cesspool with mutants who have more heads than you have brains.
Play as a girl who not only knows how to hold a weapon, but is also not afraid to use it. Do you want to survive? Turn these radioactive deserts into your own personal fight club: fight mutants, mad scientists and anyone who gets in your way.

DANGER

Here radiation is your slightest problem. Traps? Yeah, but if you're not fast enough, you'll end up as a piece of meat on someone's dinner plate. And don’t expect a kind attitude. Everyone and everything here wants one thing - to survive. But don't worry, with each new artifact you get closer to victory, and mutants are just moving targets for training.

MADNESS

Forget about the rules, there are none here. Just you, your weapon and the endless, ominous wastelands waiting for you to plunge into them. So, are you ready to become a predator among predators? Then welcome to H.E.N.T.A.L.K.E.R.. It will hurt, but damn it will be fun!

    GAME FEATURES:

  • INTERESTING and addictive gameplay
  • HUGE RELIABLE historical zone of the Chernobyl Nuclear Power Plant, we were there personally and documented it.
  • HUGE arsenal of weapons, 3 types (if you find which buttons we tied them to)
  • NON-LINEAR plot that will captivate you from the moment you start the game and won’t let you go for a long time, we guarantee!
  • FREEDOM of action, you can go left or right as well as straight, we know there is no such thing in any game.
  • JOKES and jokes that we wrote for 2 whole hours.
  • INCREDIBLE atmosphere of post-apocalypse and incredibly detailed graphics that are difficult to distinguish from reality.

content_descriptors.notes: The game has cartoonish blood and murder
